TopicTitle: Are there already Mk4 part mods?

Articles.Content:
I was thinking of making a Mk4 part mod, with Mk4 engines, fuel tanks, etc.

However, I don't want to make a mod if one already exists. Are there any Mk4 part mods?

There are some.  Off the top of my head is the Mark IV Spaceplane System:

https://spacedock.info/mod/809/Mark IV Spaceplane System

But don't let that stop you.  If you aren't exactly duplicating these parts, there typically always room for more options.

2 hours ago, DStaal said:

There are some.  Off the top of my head is the Mark IV Spaceplane System:

https://spacedock.info/mod/809/Mark IV Spaceplane System

But don't let that stop you.  If you aren't exactly duplicating these parts, there typically always room for more options. 

I see. Thanks for letting me know.
If you are looking for larger plane parts, B9 has a good collection.

The only one I can think of is the one made by @Nertea, but it seems discontinued due to "lack of interest," or downloads or something....

I would download it if it was updated....or yours if you make one. Ask Nertea if you can update the one in existence....if Nertea doesn't wish to keep it up to date going forward....
